name: Robo Tomb, Ludum Dare 40 Edition
description:
In this short game you play as a renegade ninja robot during.. lets say, a nuclear war. 

The Robot Hero needs to rescue the other little robots called Gnomes. The Gnomes will follow him when rescued, and some of them will grant him powers.

You need to rescue every Gnome in each level to clear it. Your only weapon are your bombs. Pressing Q you place a bomb and that will explode in a few seconds. 

The Gnomes are immune to the bombs but not you, so you can kill yourself. In addition, there are robot enemies, those can kill your Gnome friends. And you lose life every time one of them is killed.
